nodes.text: The "Changeling" Mark 71NB was a type of racing starfighter. Ace Squadron pilot Bo Keevil flew one, the Yellow Ace, during the New Republic Era.

The "Changeling" Mark 71NB first appeared in the 2018 Star Wars Resistance season one premiere "The Recruit", the ship model was later identified in the 2019 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition.

The starship was named after Mark Newbold, a writer for Star Wars Insider magazine and EIC of fan site Fantha Tracks, where author Adam Bray used Mark's name, last name and year of birth to designate the ship.
